edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.ui

Class CaptureHttpServletResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletResponseWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
        • edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.ui.CaptureHttpServletResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse

    public class CaptureHttpServletResponse
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
    Captures response data so that it is not immediately sent to end user. Typically used in Filters to post process output. Use the toString() method to obtain captured output.

    Version:
    $Id: CaptureHttpServletResponse.java,v 1.4 2007-04-11 08:19:24 isgwb Exp $
